Text: FFF is a great poster so please do not take offence.  The file is named "golden shower...nudist pissing".  In the interest of clarity, there is no "golden shower" and no nudist.  It is, however, a pretty good example of japanese public pissing, albeit with the censored mosaic over the pussy area.
